# Agents

Branch format:
```
agent/<agent>/<type>/<issue>-<slug>
```

Agents: claude, codex, copilot, sparks, gemini, human
Types: feat, fix, chore, docs, sec, refactor

Stop conditions:
- Permission block (record issue `status:blocked`)
- Failing CI that cannot be fixed quickly (record issue)

## Full Agent Instructions

For detailed autonomous operating instructions, see:
https://github.com/Sovereign-Operating-System/sovereign-canon/tree/master/AGENTS
